review: Rajneeti is mind blowing, aarakshan is average, and satyagraha is disappointment. Totally disappointed with this one. Same Manoj Vajpayee's grey character. Same amitabh as shown in aarakshan. Very weak plot and storyline. I was expecting something like rajneeti, but what I got is disappointment.
Best movie i've ever seen on social issues!!all characters are superb... we want more movies like this..
